\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}

\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ x $ & \ottcom{string (variable/function name)} \\
 $ \ottmv{num} $ & \ottcom{natural number} \\
 $ b $ & \ottcom{boolean} \\
 $ n_w $ & \ottcom{integer} \\
 $ \ottmv{i} ,\, \ottmv{j} ,\, \ottmv{k} ,\, \ottmv{l} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottstatus}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{status}}{::=}{\ottcom{execution status}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{Running}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{Return} \, n_w}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{TypeError}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottcurrXXstackXXframe}{
\ottrulehead{\varepsilon}{::=}{\ottcom{current stack frame - stack of block scopes}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ {\emptyset}_{\varepsilon} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{scope_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{scope_{\ottmv{i}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ [  \ottnt{scope}  ] }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ ( \ottnt{scope} :: \varepsilon ) }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathit{ \varepsilon } }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \varepsilon  \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \varepsilon' }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{update} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{,}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottcallXXstack}{
\ottrulehead{E}{::=}{\ottcom{stack of caller stack frames}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ {\emptyset}_{E} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\varepsilon_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \varepsilon_{\ottmv{i}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ ( \varepsilon :: E ) }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  E  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottscope}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{scope}}{::=}{\ottcom{frame/variable environment of current scope}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ {\emptyset}_{ \mathrm{scope} } }{}{}{}{\ottcom{empty stack frame}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ ( x  \mapsto   n_w )  \ottnt{scope} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{update variable mapping}}}

\newcommand{\ottstacks}{
\ottrulehead{\sigma}{::=}{\ottcom{stacks in execution state}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottstate}{
\ottrulehead{\Sigma}{::=}{\ottcom{execution state}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{status}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottexp}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{exp}}{::=}{\ottcom{expression}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{b}{}{}{}{\ottcom{boolean value}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{n_w}{}{}{}{\ottcom{integer value}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{x}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{==}  \ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{equality}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{subtraction}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{call} \, x  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{exp_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function call}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function execution}}}

\newcommand{\ottstmt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{stmt}}{::=}{\ottcom{statement}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{empty\_stmt}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{empty statement}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{x  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{exp_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function call}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ x  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{exp} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{assignment}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{exp}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{return}}}

\newcommand{\ottfuncXXmap}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{func\_map}}{::=}{\ottcom{function map}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{empty}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{empty function map}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{func\_map}  \ottsym{+}  \ottsym{[}  x  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}->}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{update variable mapping}}}

\newcommand{\ottterminals}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{terminals}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \rightarrow }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \rightsquigarrow }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottformula}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{formula}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{judgement}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{judgement}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{n_w  \ottsym{==}  n'_w  \ottsym{=}  b} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{n_w  \ottsym{-}  n'_w  \ottsym{=}  n''_w} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ x  \in dom( \varepsilon [  \ottmv{num}  ]) \land \forall j . \,\, j >  \ottmv{num}  \Rightarrow  x  \notin dom( \varepsilon [j]) } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{find index of variable's scope}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{n_w  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{look-up of variable in scope}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{scope'}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{scope equality (for manipulation)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\varepsilon  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon'} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{curr_stack_frame equality (for manipulation)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{E  \ottsym{=}  E'} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{call_stack equality (for manipulation)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \varepsilon  = \mathit{hd}( E ) } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{func\_map}  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{stmt}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{function lookup}}}

\newcommand{\ottexpXXsem}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{exp\_sem}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }{}{}{}{\ottcom{expression semantics}}}

\newcommand{\ottstmtXXsem}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{stmt\_sem}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \Sigma  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \Sigma'}{}{}{}{\ottcom{statement semantics}}}

\newcommand{\ottjudgement}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{judgement}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{exp\_sem}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{stmt\_sem}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottuserXXsyntax}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{user\_syntax}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{x}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{num}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{b}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{n_w}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{i}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{status}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\varepsilon}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{E}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{scope}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\sigma}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Sigma}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{exp}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{stmt}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{func\_map}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{terminals}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{formula}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottstatus\ottinterrule
\ottcurrXXstackXXframe\ottinterrule
\ottcallXXstack\ottinterrule
\ottscope\ottinterrule
\ottstacks\ottinterrule
\ottstate\ottinterrule
\ottexp\ottinterrule
\ottstmt\ottinterrule
\ottfuncXXmap\ottinterrule
\ottterminals\ottinterrule
\ottformula\ottinterrule
\ottexpXXsem\ottinterrule
\ottstmtXXsem\ottinterrule
\ottjudgement\ottinterrule
\ottuserXXsyntax\ottafterlastrule
}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulelookup}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ x  \in dom( \varepsilon [  \ottmv{num}  ]) \land \forall j . \,\, j >  \ottmv{num}  \Rightarrow  x  \notin dom( \varepsilon [j]) }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{n_w  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 [  x  ] (  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  ) \rightsquigarrow [  n_w  ] (  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{lookup}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp''}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }%
}{
 [  \ottnt{exp}  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp''}  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{sub1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp''}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }%
}{
 [  n_w  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  n_w  \ottsym{-}  \ottnt{exp''}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{sub2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesubThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{n_w  \ottsym{-}  n'_w  \ottsym{=}  n''_w}%
}{
 [  n_w  \ottsym{-}  n'_w  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  n''_w  ] (  \sigma  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{sub3}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp''}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }%
}{
 [  \ottnt{exp}  \ottsym{==}  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp''}  \ottsym{==}  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{eq1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp''}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }%
}{
 [  n_w  \ottsym{==}  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  n_w  \ottsym{==}  \ottnt{exp''}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{eq2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{n_w  \ottsym{==}  n'_w  \ottsym{=}  b}%
}{
 [  n_w  \ottsym{==}  n'_w  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  b  ] (  \sigma  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{eq3}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulefuncXXcallXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}   (  {\emptyset}_{ \mathrm{scope} }  :: \ottsym{(}   [  \ottnt{scope}  ]   \ottsym{)} ) }%
\ottpremise{E'  \ottsym{=}   (  \mathit{ \varepsilon }  :: E ) }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{func\_map}  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{stmt}}%
}{
 [  \ottkw{call} \, x  \ottsym{(}  \,  \ottsym{)}  ] (  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt}  ] (  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)}  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{func\_call\_exp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulefuncXXexec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt'}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{func\_exec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulefuncXXretXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottkw{empty\_stmt}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  n_w  ] (  \sigma'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{func\_ret\_exp}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnexpXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ [  \ottnt{exp}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma'  ) $}{\ottcom{expression semantics}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelookup{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesubThree{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqThree{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulefuncXXcallXXexp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulefuncXXexec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulefuncXXretXXexp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsexpXXsem}{
\ottdefnexpXXred{}}

% defns stmt_sem
%% defn stmt_red
\newcommand{\ottdrulefuncXXcallXXstmt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}   (  {\emptyset}_{ \mathrm{scope} }  :: \ottsym{(}   [  \ottnt{scope}  ]   \ottsym{)} ) }%
\ottpremise{E'  \ottsym{=}   (  \mathit{ \varepsilon }  :: E ) }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{func\_map}  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{stmt}}%
}{
\ottsym{[}  x  \ottsym{(}  \,  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{func\_call\_stmt}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleretXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{exp}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{exp'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ret\_exp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleretXXconst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \varepsilon'  = \mathit{hd}( E ) }%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon''  \ottsym{=}   \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{)}  \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{(}   [  \ottnt{scope}  ]   \ottsym{)} }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{return} \, n_w  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{empty\_stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon''  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Return} \, n_w  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ret\_const}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleassXXconst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ x  \in dom( \varepsilon [  \ottmv{num}  ]) \land \forall j . \,\, j >  \ottmv{num}  \Rightarrow  x  \notin dom( \varepsilon [j]) }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{scope}  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{scope'}  \ottsym{=}   ( x  \mapsto   n_w )  \ottnt{scope} }%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}  \ottkw{update} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{scope'}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{num}  \ottsym{,}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottsym{[}   x  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  n_w   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{empty\_stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ass\_const}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleassXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ] (  \sigma  ) \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ] (  \sigma'  ) }%
}{
\ottsym{[}   x  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{exp}   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}   x  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{exp'}   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Running}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ass\_exp}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnstmtXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \Sigma  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \Sigma'$}{\ottcom{statement semantics}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulefuncXXcallXXstmt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleretXXexp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleretXXconst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleassXXconst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleassXXexp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsstmtXXsem}{
\ottdefnstmtXXred{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsexpXXsem
\ottdefnsstmtXXsem
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
